title: Mightier Than the Sword

quote_first: “You will appear a few minutes after 4:20, Jean-Pierre, and then you, James, about
quote_last: But keep exactly to the same routine, act as if the meeting had taken place, as originally planned, at the Garden Party and we had all walked over to the Clarendon together.”
title: Not a Penny More, Not a Penny Less
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: — I can sneak out and say I didn’t see the email.
title: The Girl I Was
author: Jenneva Rose
